root.sql: select 序号=Row_Number()over(partition by e.PERSON_ID order by e.PERSON_ID) , c.name 单位名称, e.card_id 身份证号, e.BANK_NAME 收款账号开户行, '' 收款地区,e.BANK_CODE 银行行号,'' 汇款方式, e.BANK_CARD 收款账号,e.PERSON_NAME 收款账号名称,CASE WHEN PAY_VALUE>0 then PAY_VALUE ELSE 0 END 实发金额,'' 汇款用途,'' 备注信息,e.PHONE 收款账户短信通知手机号码 from HR_EMPLOYEE e inner join HR_COMPANY c on c.COMPANY_ID=e.COMPANY_ID inner join ( select t.PERSON_ID, sum( case t.ITEM_ID when 201 then t.PAY_VALUE*-1 when 202 then t.PAY_VALUE*-1 when 203 then t.PAY_VALUE*-1 when 206 then t.PAY_VALUE*-1 ELSE t.PAY_VALUE end ) PAY_VALUE from HR_SALARY_PAY p inner join HR_SALARY_PAY_VALUE t on t.PAY_ID=p.PAY_ID where p.STATUS=2 and p.PAY_MONTH=@payMonth and t.ITEM_ID in (101,102,103,104,105,106,107,108,109,110,111,201,202,203,206) group by t.PERSON_ID ) v on v.PERSON_ID=e.PERSON_ID

select c.NAME 单位,e.PERSON_NAME 姓名,e.CARD_ID 身份证,e.PHONE 手机,应发工资,养老,失业,医疗,工伤,生育,公积金 from ( select vv.PERSON_ID,sum(应发工资) 应发工资,sum(养老) 养老,sum(失业) 失业,sum(医疗) 医疗,sum(工伤) 工伤,sum(生育) 生育,sum(公积金) 公积金 from ( select v.PERSON_ID, case v.ITEM_ID when 0 then v.PAY_VALUE else 0 end 应发工资 , case v.ITEM_ID when 201 then v.PAY_VALUE else 0 end 养老 , case v.ITEM_ID when 202 then v.PAY_VALUE else 0 end 失业 , case v.ITEM_ID when 203 then v.PAY_VALUE else 0 end 医疗 , case v.ITEM_ID when 204 then v.PAY_VALUE else 0 end 工伤 , case v.ITEM_ID when 205 then v.PAY_VALUE else 0 end 生育 , case v.ITEM_ID when 206 then v.PAY_VALUE else 0 end 公积金 from ( -- 应发工资 select t.PERSON_ID,0 ITEM_ID,sum(t.pay_value) PAY_VALUE from HR_SALARY_PAY_VALUE t inner join HR_SALARY_PAY p on p.PAY_ID=t.PAY_ID where p.PAY_MONTH=@payMonth and t.ITEM_ID in (101,102,103,104,105,106,107,108,109,110,111) GROUP BY t.PERSON_ID union -- 个人保险 select t.PERSON_ID,t.ITEM_ID,sum(t.pay_value) PAY_VALUE from HR_SALARY_PAY_VALUE t inner join HR_SALARY_PAY p on p.PAY_ID=t.PAY_ID where p.PAY_MONTH=@payMonth and t.ITEM_ID in (201,202,203,204,205,206) GROUP BY t.PERSON_ID,t.ITEM_ID ) v ) vv group by vv.PERSON_ID ) vvv inner join HR_EMPLOYEE e on e.PERSON_ID=vvv.PERSON_ID inner join HR_COMPANY c on c.COMPANY_ID=e.COMPANY_ID

select c.NAME,isnull(yl,0) yl,isnull(sy,0) sy,isnull(yil,0) yil,isnull(gs,0) gs,isnull(shy,0) shy,isnull(gjj,0) gjj, isnull(_bx,0) _bx,isnull(_gjj,0) _gjj,isnull(bx_hj,0) bx_hj,isnull(bx_count,0) bx_count,isnull(gjj_hj,0) gjj_hj,isnull(gjj_count,0) gjj_count, isnull(v4.yfgz,0) yfgz, isnull(v4.yfgz,0)-isnull(yl,0)-isnull(sy,0)-isnull(yil,0)-isnull(gs,0)-isnull(shy,0)-isnull(gjj,0)-isnull(gshui,0)+isnull(_gjj,0)+isnull(_bx,0)+pqf fyxj from HR_COMPANY c left JOIN ( select e.COMPANY_ID, sum(case v.ITEM_ID when 201 then v.PAY_VALUE else 0 end) yl, sum(case v.ITEM_ID when 202 then v.PAY_VALUE else 0 end) sy, sum(case v.ITEM_ID when 203 then v.PAY_VALUE else 0 end) yil, sum(case v.ITEM_ID when 204 then v.PAY_VALUE else 0 end) gs, sum(case v.ITEM_ID when 205 then v.PAY_VALUE else 0 end) shy, sum(case v.ITEM_ID when 206 then v.PAY_VALUE else 0 end) gjj, sum(case v.ITEM_ID when 207 then v.PAY_VALUE else 0 end) gshui, sum(case v.ITEM_ID when 4 then v.PAY_VALUE else 0 end) _bx, sum(case v.ITEM_ID when 5 then v.PAY_VALUE else 0 end) _gjj, sum(case v.ITEM_ID when 6 then v.PAY_VALUE else 0 end) pqf from ( select t.PERSON_ID,t.ITEM_ID,sum(t.pay_value) PAY_VALUE from HR_SALARY_PAY_VALUE t inner join HR_SALARY_PAY p on p.PAY_ID=t.PAY_ID where SUBSTRING(p.PAY_MONTH,1,4)=@payYear and t.ITEM_ID in (201,202,203,204,205,206,207,4,5,6) GROUP BY t.PERSON_ID,t.ITEM_ID ) v inner join HR_EMPLOYEE e on e.PERSON_ID=v.PERSON_ID group by e.COMPANY_ID ) v1 on v1.COMPANY_ID=c.COMPANY_ID left join ( select e.COMPANY_ID,sum(v.pay_value) bx_hj,count(v.PERSON_ID) bx_count from ( select t.PERSON_ID,sum(t.pay_value) PAY_VALUE from HR_SALARY_PAY_VALUE t inner join HR_SALARY_PAY p on p.PAY_ID=t.PAY_ID where SUBSTRING(p.PAY_MONTH,1,4)=@payYear and t.ITEM_ID in (201,202,203,204,205,4) GROUP BY t.PERSON_ID ) v INNER JOIN HR_EMPLOYEE e on e.PERSON_ID=v.PERSON_ID group by e.COMPANY_ID ) v2 on v2.COMPANY_ID=c.COMPANY_ID left JOIN ( select e.COMPANY_ID,sum(v.pay_value) gjj_hj,count(v.PERSON_ID) gjj_count from ( select t.PERSON_ID,sum(t.pay_value) PAY_VALUE from HR_SALARY_PAY_VALUE t inner join HR_SALARY_PAY p on p.PAY_ID=t.PAY_ID where SUBSTRING(p.PAY_MONTH,1,4)=@payYear and t.ITEM_ID in (206,5) GROUP BY t.PERSON_ID ) v INNER JOIN HR_EMPLOYEE e on e.PERSON_ID=v.PERSON_ID group by e.COMPANY_ID ) v3 on v3.COMPANY_ID=c.COMPANY_ID left join ( select e.COMPANY_ID,sum(v.pay_value) yfgz from ( select t.PERSON_ID,sum(t.pay_value) PAY_VALUE from HR_SALARY_PAY_VALUE t inner join HR_SALARY_PAY p on p.PAY_ID=t.PAY_ID where SUBSTRING(p.PAY_MONTH,1,4)=@payYear and t.ITEM_ID>=101 and t.ITEM_ID<=111 GROUP BY t.PERSON_ID ) v INNER JOIN HR_EMPLOYEE e on e.PERSON_ID=v.PERSON_ID group by e.COMPANY_ID ) v4 on v4.COMPANY_ID=c.COMPANY_ID where c.STATE=0 and c.name is not null ORDER BY c.NAME

select c.NAME,isnull(yl,0) yl,isnull(sy,0) sy,isnull(yil,0) yil,isnull(gs,0) gs,isnull(shy,0) shy,isnull(gjj,0) gjj, isnull(_bx,0) _bx,isnull(_gjj,0) _gjj,isnull(bx_hj,0) bx_hj,isnull(bx_count,0) bx_count,isnull(gjj_hj,0) gjj_hj,isnull(gjj_count,0) gjj_count, isnull(v4.yfgz,0) yfgz, isnull(v4.yfgz,0)-isnull(yl,0)-isnull(sy,0)-isnull(yil,0)-isnull(gs,0)-isnull(shy,0)-isnull(gjj,0)-isnull(gshui,0)+isnull(_gjj,0)+isnull(_bx,0)+pqf fyxj from HR_COMPANY c left JOIN ( select e.COMPANY_ID, sum(case v.ITEM_ID when 201 then v.PAY_VALUE else 0 end) yl, sum(case v.ITEM_ID when 202 then v.PAY_VALUE else 0 end) sy, sum(case v.ITEM_ID when 203 then v.PAY_VALUE else 0 end) yil, sum(case v.ITEM_ID when 204 then v.PAY_VALUE else 0 end) gs, sum(case v.ITEM_ID when 205 then v.PAY_VALUE else 0 end) shy, sum(case v.ITEM_ID when 206 then v.PAY_VALUE else 0 end) gjj, sum(case v.ITEM_ID when 207 then v.PAY_VALUE else 0 end) gshui, sum(case v.ITEM_ID when 4 then v.PAY_VALUE else 0 end) _bx, sum(case v.ITEM_ID when 5 then v.PAY_VALUE else 0 end) _gjj, sum(case v.ITEM_ID when 6 then v.PAY_VALUE else 0 end) pqf from ( select t.PERSON_ID,t.ITEM_ID,sum(t.pay_value) PAY_VALUE from HR_SALARY_PAY_VALUE t inner join HR_SALARY_PAY p on p.PAY_ID=t.PAY_ID where p.PAY_MONTH=@payDate and t.ITEM_ID in (201,202,203,204,205,206,207,4,5,6) GROUP BY t.PERSON_ID,t.ITEM_ID ) v inner join HR_EMPLOYEE e on e.PERSON_ID=v.PERSON_ID group by e.COMPANY_ID ) v1 on v1.COMPANY_ID=c.COMPANY_ID left join ( select e.COMPANY_ID,sum(v.pay_value) bx_hj,count(v.PERSON_ID) bx_count from ( select t.PERSON_ID,sum(t.pay_value) PAY_VALUE from HR_SALARY_PAY_VALUE t inner join HR_SALARY_PAY p on p.PAY_ID=t.PAY_ID where p.PAY_MONTH=@payDate and t.ITEM_ID in (201,202,203,204,205,4) GROUP BY t.PERSON_ID ) v INNER JOIN HR_EMPLOYEE e on e.PERSON_ID=v.PERSON_ID group by e.COMPANY_ID ) v2 on v2.COMPANY_ID=c.COMPANY_ID left JOIN ( select e.COMPANY_ID,sum(v.pay_value) gjj_hj,count(v.PERSON_ID) gjj_count from ( select t.PERSON_ID,sum(t.pay_value) PAY_VALUE from HR_SALARY_PAY_VALUE t inner join HR_SALARY_PAY p on p.PAY_ID=t.PAY_ID where p.PAY_MONTH=@payDate and t.ITEM_ID in (206,5) GROUP BY t.PERSON_ID ) v INNER JOIN HR_EMPLOYEE e on e.PERSON_ID=v.PERSON_ID group by e.COMPANY_ID ) v3 on v3.COMPANY_ID=c.COMPANY_ID left join ( select e.COMPANY_ID,sum(v.pay_value) yfgz from ( select t.PERSON_ID,sum(t.pay_value) PAY_VALUE from HR_SALARY_PAY_VALUE t inner join HR_SALARY_PAY p on p.PAY_ID=t.PAY_ID where p.PAY_MONTH=@payDate and t.ITEM_ID>=101 and t.ITEM_ID<=111 GROUP BY t.PERSON_ID ) v INNER JOIN HR_EMPLOYEE e on e.PERSON_ID=v.PERSON_ID group by e.COMPANY_ID ) v4 on v4.COMPANY_ID=c.COMPANY_ID where c.STATE=0 and c.name is not null ORDER BY c.NAME

select c.COMPANY_ID,c.NAME, v1.lz,v2.zz,v3.yf,v3.yf-v4.yk sf from HR_COMPANY c LEFT JOIN ( select t.COMPANY_ID,count(*) lz from HR_EMPLOYEE t where SUBSTRING(t.LEAVE_TIME,1,4)=@year group by t.COMPANY_ID ) v1 on v1.COMPANY_ID=c.COMPANY_ID left JOIN( select t.COMPANY_ID,count(t.person_id) zz from HR_EMPLOYEE t where ( t.Contract_FirstTime is null or SUBSTRING(t.Contract_FirstTime,1,4)<=@year ) and (t.State=0 or SUBSTRING(t.LEAVE_TIME,1,4)<@year ) group by t.COMPANY_ID )v2 on v2.COMPANY_ID=c.COMPANY_ID LEFT JOIN( select p.COMPANY_ID,sum(pv.pay_value) yf from HR_SALARY_PAY p inner join HR_SALARY_PAY_VALUE pv on pv.PAY_ID=p.PAY_ID where SUBSTRING(p.PAY_MONTH,1,4)=@year and p.STATUS=2 and pv.ITEM_ID in (101,102,103,104,105,106,107,108,109,110,111) GROUP BY p.COMPANY_ID ) v3 on v3.COMPANY_ID=c.COMPANY_ID LEFT JOIN( select p.COMPANY_ID,sum(pv.pay_value) yk from HR_SALARY_PAY p inner join HR_SALARY_PAY_VALUE pv on pv.PAY_ID=p.PAY_ID where SUBSTRING(p.PAY_MONTH,1,4)=@year and p.STATUS=2 and pv.ITEM_ID in (201,202,203,204,205,206,207) GROUP BY p.COMPANY_ID ) v4 ON v4.COMPANY_ID=c.COMPANY_ID where c.STATE=0 and c.name is not null order by c.NAME

select c.COMPANY_ID,p.POSITION_ID, c.NAME,p.POSITION_NAME,jh,jh-zz kq,xrz,'' xrzName,lz,'' lzName,zz,yfgz,yfgz-yk sfgz from ( select COMPANY_ID,POSITION_ID,sum(jh) jh from ( SELECT s.COMPANY_ID,s.POSITION_ID,sum(s.plan_count) jh FROM HR_CO_SETTING s GROUP BY s.COMPANY_ID,s.POSITION_ID union all select e.COMPANY_ID,e.POSITION_ID,0 jh from HR_EMPLOYEE e ) v group by COMPANY_ID,POSITION_ID ) v1 LEFT join ( select t.COMPANY_ID,t.POSITION_ID,count(t.person_id) zz from HR_EMPLOYEE t where state=0 group by t.COMPANY_ID,t.POSITION_ID ) v2 on v2.COMPANY_ID=v1.COMPANY_ID and v2.POSITION_ID=v1.POSITION_ID LEFT join ( select t.COMPANY_ID,t.POSITION_ID,count(t.person_id) lz from HR_EMPLOYEE t where CONVERT(datetime,t.LEAVE_TIME,101)>=CONVERT(datetime,@beginDate,101) and CONVERT(datetime,t.LEAVE_TIME,101)<=CONVERT(datetime,@endDate,101) group by t.COMPANY_ID,t.POSITION_ID ) v3 on v3.COMPANY_ID=v1.COMPANY_ID and v3.POSITION_ID=v1.POSITION_ID LEFT join ( select t.COMPANY_ID,t.POSITION_ID,count(t.person_id) xrz from HR_EMPLOYEE t where CONVERT(datetime,t.Contract_FirstTime,101)>=CONVERT(datetime,@beginDate,101) and CONVERT(datetime,t.Contract_FirstTime,101)<=CONVERT(datetime,@endDate,101) group by t.COMPANY_ID,t.POSITION_ID ) v4 on v4.COMPANY_ID=v1.COMPANY_ID and v4.POSITION_ID=v1.POSITION_ID left join ( select p.COMPANY_ID,sum(pv.pay_value) yfgz from HR_SALARY_PAY p inner join HR_SALARY_PAY_VALUE pv on pv.PAY_ID=p.PAY_ID where p.PAY_MONTH=@queryDate and p.STATUS=2 and pv.ITEM_ID in (101,102,103,104,105,106,107,108,109,110,111) GROUP BY p.COMPANY_ID ) v5 on v5.COMPANY_ID=v1.COMPANY_ID left join( select p.COMPANY_ID,sum(pv.pay_value) yk from HR_SALARY_PAY p inner join HR_SALARY_PAY_VALUE pv on pv.PAY_ID=p.PAY_ID where p.PAY_MONTH=@queryDate and p.STATUS=2 and pv.ITEM_ID in (201,202,203,204,205,206,207) GROUP BY p.COMPANY_ID ) v6 on v6.COMPANY_ID=v1.COMPANY_ID inner join HR_COMPANY c on v1.COMPANY_ID=c.COMPANY_ID and c.STATE=0 inner JOIN HR_POSITION p on v1.POSITION_ID=p.POSITION_ID order BY c.NAME

select t.COMPANY_ID,t.POSITION_ID,t.PERSON_NAME from HR_EMPLOYEE t where CONVERT(datetime,t.Contract_FirstTime,101)<=CONVERT(datetime,@endDate,101) and CONVERT(datetime,t.Contract_FirstTime,101)>=CONVERT(datetime,@beginDate,101) ORDER BY t.COMPANY_ID,t.POSITION_ID,t.PERSON_NAME

select t.COMPANY_ID,t.POSITION_ID,t.PERSON_NAME from HR_EMPLOYEE t where CONVERT(datetime,t.LEAVE_TIME,101)<=CONVERT(datetime,@endDate,101) and CONVERT(datetime,t.LEAVE_TIME,101)>=CONVERT(datetime,@beginDate,101) ORDER BY t.COMPANY_ID,t.POSITION_ID,t.PERSON_NAME

select c.NAME,p.POSITION_NAME,v1.planCount kzs, isnull(v2.nums,0) lwpq, isnull(v3.nums,0) dwgl, isnull(v1.realCount,0) sys,v1.planCount - isnull(v1.realCount,0) kqs from HR_COMPANY c left JOIN ( select COMPANY_ID,POSITION_ID,sum(planCount) planCount,sum(realCount) realCount from ( select s.COMPANY_ID,s.POSITION_ID,sum(s.PLAN_COUNT) planCount,0 realCount from HR_CO_SETTING s group by s.COMPANY_ID,s.POSITION_ID union all select e.COMPANY_ID,e.POSITION_ID,0 planCount, count(*) realCount from HR_EMPLOYEE e where e.State=0 GROUP BY e.COMPANY_ID,e.POSITION_ID ) vv group by COMPANY_ID,POSITION_ID
) v1 on v1.COMPANY_ID=c.COMPANY_ID left JOIN ( select s.COMPANY_ID,s.POSITION_ID,sum(s.PLAN_COUNT) nums from HR_CO_SETTING s where s.USE_TYPE='劳务派遣' group by s.COMPANY_ID,s.POSITION_ID ) v2 on v2.COMPANY_ID=c.COMPANY_ID and v1.POSITION_ID=v2.POSITION_ID left JOIN ( select s.COMPANY_ID,s.POSITION_ID,sum(s.PLAN_COUNT) nums from HR_CO_SETTING s where s.USE_TYPE='单位管理' group by s.COMPANY_ID,s.POSITION_ID ) v3 on v3.COMPANY_ID=c.COMPANY_ID and v1.POSITION_ID=v3.POSITION_ID inner join HR_POSITION p on p.POSITION_ID=v1.POSITION_ID order by c.COMPANY_ID,v1.POSITION_ID

with pv as ( select t.PERSON_ID, sum(case t.ITEM_ID when 101 then t.PAY_VALUE else 0 end) jbgz, sum(case t.ITEM_ID when 102 then t.PAY_VALUE else 0 end) jxgz, sum(case t.ITEM_ID when 103 then t.PAY_VALUE else 0 end) gwgz, sum(case t.ITEM_ID when 104 then t.PAY_VALUE else 0 end) other, sum(case t.ITEM_ID when 201 then t.PAY_VALUE else 0 end) ylao, sum(case t.ITEM_ID when 202 then t.PAY_VALUE else 0 end) sye, sum(case t.ITEM_ID when 203 then t.PAY_VALUE else 0 end) yliao, sum(case t.ITEM_ID when 204 then t.PAY_VALUE else 0 end) gshang, sum(case t.ITEM_ID when 205 then t.PAY_VALUE else 0 end) syu, sum(case t.ITEM_ID when 206 then t.PAY_VALUE else 0 end) gjj, sum(case t.ITEM_ID when 207 then t.PAY_VALUE else 0 end) gs, sum(case t.ITEM_ID when 6 then t.PAY_VALUE else 0 end) fwf from HR_SALARY_PAY_VALUE t inner join HR_SALARY_PAY p on p.PAY_ID=t.PAY_ID where p.PAY_MONTH='#yyyy-mm-dd#' GROUP BY t.PERSON_ID ), cv as ( select t.PERSON_ID, sum(case t.ITEM_ID when 201 then t.ITEM_CMP_VALUE else 0 end) cylao, sum(case t.ITEM_ID when 202 then t.ITEM_CMP_VALUE else 0 end) csye, sum(case t.ITEM_ID when 203 then t.ITEM_CMP_VALUE else 0 end) cyliao, sum(case t.ITEM_ID when 204 then t.ITEM_CMP_VALUE else 0 end) cgshang, sum(case t.ITEM_ID when 205 then t.ITEM_CMP_VALUE else 0 end) csyu, sum(case t.ITEM_ID when 206 then t.ITEM_CMP_VALUE else 0 end) cgjj from HR_SALARY_IMPORTOR_DATA t where t.PAY_MONTH='#yyyymm#' group by t.PERSON_ID ) select e.PERSON_NAME, jbgz,jxgz,jbgz+jxgz+gwgz+other yfgz, ylao,sye,yliao,ylao+sye+yliao grjl, cylao, csye,cgshang,cyliao+csyu cyliao,cylao+csye+cgshang+cyliao+csyu dwjl, pv.fwf,(jbgz+jxgz+gwgz+other)-(ylao+sye+yliao)+(cylao+csye+cgshang+cyliao+csyu) total from pv left join cv on pv.PERSON_ID=cv.PERSON_ID inner join HR_EMPLOYEE e on e.PERSON_ID=pv.PERSON_ID where 1=1 #where# order by e.CMP_NAME,e.PERSON_NAME
